**Please check if the PR fulfills these requirements**
- [ ] The code follows our [code style](https://github.com/linuxchata/fido2/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-guidelines)
- [ ] The commit message follows our [guidelines](https://github.com/linuxchata/fido2/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#submitting-changes)
- [ ] Tests for the changes have been added
- [ ] All new and existing tests passed
- [ ] Documentation have been added / updated
